about: Forte Graphics offers a variety of services including logo design, short video promos, logo animations, chatbots and materials for both print and digital purposes. about:
My design philosophy is simple: Clever. Unique. Simple.
  I have 20 years experience creating branding for clients who want something very original and memorable.
  I believe in clever branding. Clever is memorable.

about:
Hello,
  My name is Daniel and I am from Romania. I am a full time Graphic Designer with extensive experience in marketing and print design (especially brand identity). I am very passionate about my work and I owe it all to my constant hunger for learning and limitless imagination.
  I am also in love with horses and I am spending all my free time in their company.

about: Somos un estudio comprometido con su trabajo. Tratamos de solventar las necesidades de nuestros clientes cuidando todos los detalles. Nos encanta crear y aportar soluciones de alto nivel a todo aquel que confía en nosotros. Nos encantan los proyectos originales y únicos a los que podamos volcarles toda nuestra pasión y conocimiento. Las marcas, como la propia vida, son crecimiento y estamos aquí para darle forma.

about:
Hello everyone!
  My name is Boris. I'm a graduated master graphic designer. Here to show my ideas to others and help you achieve your goals . My specialty is logo design and branding, photography retouching, illustrations and digital painting... but I also do all sorts of stuff, from drawing and painting to playing music and singing. I like to consider myself as an artist, so you can expect out of box thinking and some fresh and new ideas! I hope you like my designs.

about:
Nací en Mérida, Yucatán, México. Desde muy pequeño me interesé por el mundo del diseño, sobre todo al momento al descubrir la historia de la Bauhaus y el constructivismo ruso, lo cual me inspiró a intentar crear un estilo diferente en el diseño de posters. Me especializo en el diseño de carteles y el branding. He diseñado identidades para algunas marcas y artistas en crecimiento.
  Tengo experiencia en Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, Indesign y 3DMax.

about: I provide amazing logos, web, print along many OTHER SERVICES. All original editable and resizable concepts are created with Adobe Illustrator. The designs are layered and well-organized. All of the work is done in CMYK. Any alternative file format will be delivered directly upon request. Run timings can be customized quickly together with client cooperation. Different file formats requested upon client preferred. It's a pleasure to working in a new creation!

about: Hello, I’m an experienced graphic designer and art director from Austria. I studied photography and graphic designs and worked later for big advertisig agencies like Jung von Matt. I worked for clients like Burger King, City Vienna, Saturn, ErsteBank and Croma. At the moment I’m in Colombia and prefer to create in a more flexible way. I love clean and modern designs. My strengths are Branding, LogoDesign, EditorialDesign, Photoedition and Creative Conception.

about:
Hi! My name is Kiriakos, web developer and web designer from Thessaloniki, Greece.
  I've been on the internet since 2001. I always tried to do something with programming. Since I was not very good with programming, I was asking for help from other people. But as you probably guess, I had so many problems with programmers. Then, I decided to improve my programming skills.
  Now, I am a passionate and educated web developer & designer, always following best practices.

about:
Hi! I am a passionate graphic designer based in Asia, with 10+ years of experience. I am an expert in creating brands that help your business appear professional,  visually appealing and most importantly, convey effectively your company's ethos and values
  to your target market. I'm a perfectionist by nature and all my work reflects that. So if you need a professional logo and brand identity, I am here to create it!

about: Hey there, I am Nazmul. A creative logo and print designer. Designers are creative problem solvers, so each brief represents a fresh challenge. I am experienced in the fields of branding, and print media design. The first goal is to make my clients satisfied with my design skills. There are always new trends, new tools, new technologies, new theories, new sources of inspiration – a creative mind never stops learning.

about:
Hi, I'm Ileana. I have a B.A. in Graphic Design, Buenos Aires University. I taught college, and over the last 20 years, I have been working in Corporate Design as an Art Director for Toyota, LoJack, Securitas, L'Oreal, OSDE, and many other companies.
  I also worked as a planner for large-scale events for top-of-the-line companies, including the launches for the 2012 Toyota Corolla and Toyota 86.

reviews: ['I am very happy with the logo that Ileana designed for my new medical spa. It is beautiful and elegant and exactly what’s I was looking for. ', 'This was truly a wonderful experience working with lizbotta0F. She knows what she wants and is also very flexible when it comes to new ideas.', 'Ileana is very artistic and has a keen eye for flow and design. She was very attentive and responded quickly with requests for changes and updates. I highly recommend her and her work. Would absolutely work with again. ', "Ileana was fabulous to work with. about:
Graphiste freelance, j’exerce depuis plus de dix ans la spécialisation du design de logo.
  Votre futur logo sera la pièce maîtresse de votre identité visuelle.
  Créé sur-mesure, il sera au reflet de votre cahier des charges et de vos attentes. Il sera sobre, premium, ou bien audacieux, dans un style capable de permettre à votre marque d’être reconnaissable en un clin d’œil.
  Simple, d’esprit flat design, figuratif ou iconique.

I am a graphic designer.
  Graphics are my profession and my job.
  I have been working in graphic design professionally for about 12 years.
  What I will do for you is, in fact, my credit. So your order is very important to me.
  I am here to help you get a better view of your profession and work.

about:

  It would be my pleasure to meet up with you on the project board and get the ideas come to life on canvas.
